amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike sections 528 and 529 which prohibit the use of funds to be used to transfer or release any detainee who is or was held at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba or to construct any facility in the U.S. to house any detainee held at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in the Congressional Record to strike sections 528 and 529 which prohibit the use of funds to be used to transfer or release any detainee who is or was held at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba or construct any facility in the U.S. to house any detainee held at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 230 (Roll no. 254).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Moran amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 230 (Roll no. 254).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A049) offered by Mr. Moran.
